title: Restrictions for "AFK"ing part of one game this year.
body:
I have ten minute "low priority" ques as this morning I got dx/dll errors, and had to download and resinstall my video drivers before I could load in.

Mods can even see that when I did join the game, I ended up getting honoured.

Can you please reconsider these restrictions? It was an honest problem I couldn't avoid....

replies.body:
Read up [this](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=468889). It's dated in terms of the actual sentence, but the conditions met for the punishment are the same.

Under no circumstances will your punishment be removed.
